sentences.sentence: Pyracantha also right in the application of the garden to investigate and summarized.
sentences.translation: 同时还对火棘在园林中应用情况进行调查并归纳总结。

sentences.sentence: The succulent fruit wall of Pyracantha develops from the hypanthium mainly by cell enlargement;
sentences.translation: 红子果实的肉质果壁是由托附杯借细胞体积增大发育而来。

sentences.sentence: This paper summarized firethorn ornamental and medicinal value, food, chemical values, to enhance the understanding of pyracantha.
sentences.translation: 本文通过归纳火棘的观赏价值和药用，食用，化工的价值，提高对火棘的了解。
